H0.text: By what name is the garden flowering plant hypericum commonly known. St. John's Wort

H1.text: By what name is the garden flowering plant hypericum commonly known. Rose of Sharon

H2.text: By what name is the garden flowering plant hypericum commonly known. Aaron's Beard

H3.text: By what name is the garden flowering plant hypericum commonly known. Neurokan

A4.text: All members of the genus may be referred to as St. John's wort
